threats.title: AB01 Failure Of Cloud Application
threats.description:
Unexpected failure of the cloud application;
reason: HTTP request;

threats.title: AB02 Connection Lost To Cloud Application
threats.description:
Connection lost to the cloud application;
reason: HTTP request;

threats.title: AC01 Malware From Cloud Application
threats.description:
Malicious content (malware) from the cloud application;
reason: HTTP request;

threats.title: AC02 Public Network Access To Cloud Application
threats.description:
Remote user connects to the cloud application though a public network (e.g. Wi-Fi) and can be attacked by a third-party adversary;
reason: HTTP request;

threats.title: AC03 Social Engineering Against Remote User
threats.description:
Remote user suffers from Social Engineering attacks, performed by third-party adversary (e.g. including the cloud application into phishing schema);
reason: HTTP request;

threats.title: Generic repudiation threat
threats.description:
A generic repudiation threat;
reason: HTTP response; HTTP request;

threats.title: Generic spoofing threat
threats.description:
A generic spoofing threat;
reason: HTTP response; HTTP request;

threats.title: AB01 Failure Of Cloud Application
threats.description:
Unexpected failure of the cloud application;
reason: HTTP request; HTTP request;

threats.title: AB02 Connection Lost To Cloud Application
threats.description:
Connection lost to the cloud application;
reason: HTTP request; HTTP request;

threats.title: AD01 Broken Authentication
threats.description:
No authentication or broken (weak) authentication by the cloud application;
reason: HTTP response; HTTP response; HTTP request;

threats.title: AD02 Broken Access Control
threats.description:
No access control, broken (weak) access control, and the authorization issues of the cloud application;
reason: HTTP response; HTTP response; HTTP request;

threats.title: AD03 Data Breach By Cloud Application
threats.description:
Data breach (information disclosure) by the cloud application;
reason: HTTP response; HTTP response; HTTP request;

threats.title: AD04 Data Loss By Cloud Application
threats.description:
Data loss (modification) by the cloud application;
reason: HTTP response; HTTP response; HTTP request;

threats.title: AD05 Backup Of Cloud Application Lost
threats.description:
Lost of cloud application backup;
reason: HTTP response; HTTP response; HTTP request;

threats.title: AD06 Backup Of Cloud Application Stolen
threats.description:
Disclosure of cloud application backups;
reason: HTTP response; HTTP response; HTTP request;

threats.title: AD07 Logs Of Cloud Application Lost
threats.description:
Lost of cloud application logs;
reason: HTTP response; HTTP response; HTTP request;

threats.title: AD08 Logs Of Cloud Application Stolen
threats.description:
Disclosure of sensitive information from cloud application logs;
reason: HTTP response; HTTP response; HTTP request;

threats.title: AE01 DDoS Attack To Cloud Application
threats.description:
DDoS/DoS attack against cloud application from the Internet;
reason: HTTP request;

threats.title: AE02 EDoS Attack To Cloud Application
threats.description:
EDoS (Economic Denial of Sustainability or Economic Denial of Service) attack against cloud application from the Internet;
reason: HTTP request;

threats.title: AE03 Network Attacks To Cloud Application
threats.description:
Remote side can perform remote malicious activities based on misconfiguration or vulnerabilities of the cloud application;
reason: HTTP request;

threats.title: AE04 Cloud Application Abuse
threats.description:
Malicious usage (abuse) of cloud application from the Internet (e.g. sending spam, participating botnet, mining) after gain control on it;
reason: HTTP request;

threats.title: AE05 Block Shared Resources Of Cloud Application
threats.description:
Blocking shared resources of cloud application (e.g. shared external IP) by a third-part reputation service;
reason: HTTP request;

threats.title: AE06 Disclosure Of Credentials Of Cloud Management Interface
threats.description:
Disclosure of user credentials of management interface of cloud application;
reason: HTTP request;
